text:
@GovMurphy Are you concerned that the protests will help ignite more spread of the virus? 

If not then why aren’t morr things allowed? If so, then why didn’t you stop them?

Ignoring legit questions makes you look like a bad leader. 

#NJPROTEST #COVID19 @Jack4NJ @SaveJersey
